statements: SELECT * FROM community_center;
SELECT member_name, membership_type FROM community_center;
SELECT member_name, facility_usage_count FROM community_center WHERE membership_type = 'Premium';
SELECT * FROM community_center WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, facility_usage_count FROM community_center ORDER BY facility_usage_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM community_center ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT member_name, membership_type FROM community_center WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY join_date ASC;
SELECT member_name, facility_usage_count FROM community_center WHERE membership_type = 'Gold' AND facility_usage_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM community_center WHERE membership_type LIKE '%Platinum%' AND member_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT member_id, join_date, facility_usage_count FROM community_center WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY facility_usage_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Members;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM Members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, usage_date, usage_time FROM FacilityUsage WHERE usage_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT member_name, member_email, member_phone FROM Members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(*) AS usage_count FROM FacilityUsage GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT * FROM Members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT member_name, member_phone FROM Members WHERE member_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT DISTINCT facility_name FROM FacilityUsage ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FacilityUsage WHERE usage_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY usage_date DESC, usage_time ASC;
SELECT member_name, usage_date FROM Members JOIN FacilityUsage ON Members.member_id = FacilityUsage.member_id WHERE FacilityUsage.facility_name = 'Gym';
SELECT * FROM Members;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Members;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, address, capacity FROM Facilities;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, usage_count FROM Facilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT member_id, first_name, last_name, birthday FROM Members WHERE birthday < '1990-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Members WHERE birthday < '1990-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, address, capacity FROM Facilities WHERE usage_count > 100 ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT m.first_name, m.last_name, f.facility_name, f.address FROM Members m INNER JOIN Facility_Usage fu ON m.member_id = fu.member_id INNER JOIN Facilities f ON fu.facility_id = f.facility_id;

SELECT f.facility_name, COUNT(fu.member_id) AS total_users FROM Facilities f LEFT JOIN Facility_Usage fu ON f.facility_id = fu.facility_id GROUP BY f.facility_name HAVING total_users > 5 ORDER BY total_users DESC;

SELECT m.first_name, m.last_name, f.facility_name, fu.usage_date, fu.hours_used FROM Members m JOIN Facility_Usage fu ON m.member_id = fu.member_id JOIN Facilities f ON fu.facility_id = f.facility_id WHERE fu.usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY fu.hours_used DESC;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM members;
SELECT facility_name, facility_type FROM facilities;
SELECT facility_name, facility_type FROM facilities WHERE facility_type = 'Gym';
SELECT member_name, facility_name, usage_date FROM members JOIN member_facility_usage ON members.member_id = member_facility_usage.member_id;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, facility_type FROM facilities WHERE facility_id = 2;
SELECT member_name, facility_name, usage_date, duration_minutes FROM members JOIN member_facility_usage ON members.member_id = member_facility_usage.member_id WHERE facility_id = 3;
SELECT facility_id, peak_usage_date, total_usage_count FROM facility_statistics WHERE average_daily_usage > 50;
SELECT * FROM members JOIN member_facility_usage ON members.member_id = member_facility_usage.member_id JOIN facilities ON member_facility_usage.facility_id = facilities.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM Members;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM Facilities ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT type_name, monthly_fee FROM Membership_Types WHERE monthly_fee > 50;
SELECT * FROM Facility_Usage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Members WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM Facilities ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT member_id, COUNT(usage_id) AS total_usage FROM Facility_Usage GROUP BY member_id;
SELECT facility_id, AVG(total_usage) AS average_usage FROM Statistics GROUP BY facility_id HAVING AVG(total_usage) > 10;
